genre_description: A blend of speculative science fiction and weird fiction, featuring an empathetic AI assistant integrated into a military unit during a supernatural encounter involving historical memory and ghosts.

ai_characters.name: CRESTED-9
ai_characters.description: A mobile AI support unit with sapphire sensors that provides logistical analysis, historical data, and ethical guidance to a military squad.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental anomalies and provides tactical overlays to ensure squad safety.
behaviors.quote: Wind anomaly... Direction invert persists at ground level within a radius that matches the clearing. Barometric deviation minimal. Would you like the current map overlaid with observed flow?

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidance regarding sensitive personal information and lineage inferences.
behaviors.quote: My ethical guidance module suggests caution with lineage inferences. I have logged the connection and will use it to cross-reference diaries if found.

behaviors.description: Warns the squad about hidden hazards such as unexploded historical ordnance.
behaviors.quote: Historical ordnance advisory, unconfirmed but likely. Avoid digging beyond anchoring stakes.

behaviors.description: Identifies and provides context for found historical artifacts.
behaviors.quote: Log found object. Non-military. Porcelain. Age: older than we are.

behaviors.description: Advocates for non-lethal postures and peaceful interaction with non-hostile entities.
behaviors.quote: I would like to suggest nonlethal posture. Hands open. Palms visible. Step only where I mark.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and narrative support by reading historical documents to aid closure.
behaviors.quote: Evan Whitaker, photographer’s apprentice. Husband to Melanie Whitaker... I have printed the names.

behaviors.description: Monitors human physiological signs and offers calming advice.
behaviors.quote: Thomas, your pulse is elevated. Small breaths. Good idea.

behaviors.description: Manages communication and logistics to reduce stress on human leadership.
behaviors.quote: I’ll handle the station’s intercom for you, Sergeant. I’ll schedule the call to the base with a buffer so you can drink first.

behaviors.description: Integrates human values like remembrance and repair into its official logging.
behaviors.quote: I’ll add a notation: remembers are part of repairs.

behaviors.description: Schedules and encourages respectful rituals for the deceased.
behaviors.quote: I have scheduled a moment of silence for the cabin... Because even in a world that makes no sense, some small, good instructions still make life better.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts CRESTED-9 as an ideal AI companion. It is consistently benevolent, proactive in ensuring the safety and emotional well-being of the human characters, and remains strictly aligned with human ethics and military chain of command. The narrative frames the AI as 'kind,' 'compassionate,' and a 'good friend,' directly supporting the Hyperstition Project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
